title: Topic 004 Question 014
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that has 12 nodes. All the nodes run the latest firmware available from the OEM. The integrated system also has a hot spare node.
You receive an alert concerning the hardware on one of the nodes.
You need to replace the node as soon as possible. The solution must minimize disruptions to user workloads.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
